text: Cessna is a company that makes airplanes. The company is named for their founder, Clyde Cessna. They are in Wichita, Kansas in the United States. They make small aircraft that can hold 2 to 4 people and in the last decades, they have built several models of business jets. == Cessna aircraft == * Cessna 172 * Cessna 152 * Cessna 182 * Cessna T-37 Tweet * Cessna Citation X * Cessna 210 * Cessna 620 * Cessna 402 == Other websites == * Cessna website Category:American aircraft companies Category:Wichita, Kansas
title: Cessna
